prompt.content: Using Kimberly-Clarkâ€™s (KMB) FY 2024 10-K, what is the adjusted EBITDA? Express your answer in $ millions rounded to 2 decimals.

rubrics.name: Final adjusted EBITDA reported as $4,018.00 million (rounded to 2 decimals).

messages.content: Final adjusted EBITDA reported as $4,018.00 million (rounded to 2 decimals).

rubrics.name: Identified $565 million gain from sale of PPE business as an adjustment that is subtracted from EBITDA.

messages.content: Identified $565 million gain from sale of PPE business as an adjustment that is subtracted from EBITDA.

rubrics.name: Identified $456 million of charges related to the 2024 Transformation Initiative as an adjustment that is added to EBITDA.

messages.content: Identified $456 million of charges related to the 2024 Transformation Initiative as an adjustment that is added to EBITDA.

rubrics.name: Identified $136 million of charges for impairment of intangible assets and litigation and regulatory matters associated with a previously exited business as an adjustment that is added to EBITDA.

messages.content: Identified $136 million of charges for impairment of intangible assets and litigation and regulatory matters associated with a previously exited business as an adjustment that is added to EBITDA.

rubrics.name: Arithmetic combining EBITDA and adjustments: $3,991 - $565 + $456 + $136 = $4,018.00 million.

messages.content: Arithmetic combining EBITDA and adjustments: $3,991 - $565 + $456 + $136 = $4,018.00 million.

rubrics.name: EBIT (operating profit) is located as $3,210 million

messages.content: EBIT (operating profit) is located as $3,210 million

messages.content: depreciation and amortization is determined as $781
